name: code-interview-platform
description: Online coding interview platform with real-time collaboration

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "npm start --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
